page.title: 20Holidays in Wash Common
page.content: In the lower three classes of the juniors caravanning seemed to be the most popular holiday and most people camped abroad. 18 people were staying with relatives or freinds and 15 people were staying in hotels and 14 in self catering flats or villas, 23 people stayed in this country and 9 are going to France, 4 to Spain and 3 to Germany. We asked the teachers where they are going. 4 teachers are going abroad - 1 to Israel,1 to Germany and France and the other 2 are going to Greece and Portugal. The techers staying in this country are spread out from Scotland to Devon, the Lake District to Dorset. The three dinner ladies are going to Devon, St. Davids and the coast. I think that holidays will change in 50 years, and may even be on the moon.
